Docs.param: Destination span to copy to.
Docs.summary: Copies data from the current position to the given destination span if there is enough data to fill it.
Docs.returns: if there is enough data to completely fill the span; otherwise, .

remarks.format: This method copies a fixed amount of data out of the sequence if possible. It does not advance the reader. To look ahead for a specific stream of data, use <xref:System.Buffers.SequenceReader`1.IsNext(System.ReadOnlySpan{`0},System.Boolean)>.
